attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Would it not be easier, and less stress for all if the CSA to work on an amount instead of an unfair %?

How about £250 for the 1st child £300 for two children and £350 for three or more children.

If this amount is not affordable then look into reassessmsnts / circumstances etc.

surely this would encourage all to financially support their children.

This will also be a huge benefit for the NRP to enable them to get a life together without being penalised and have less stress in their home and will stop pwc demanding more money when really it takes two to create a child, as does it to support them.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
False or incomplete name or address information
